EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering interest in NCS with The Challenge!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
Exclusive Tower Hamlets NCS event!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for expressing an interest in NCS with The Challenge!
We would like to invite you, your family and friends to join us at our exclusive Tower Hamlets event on 26.04.2014 at the John Scurr Community Centre, 1A Bekesbourne St, London, E14 7JQ.
The event will run from 2.00pm-4.00pm and is a great chance for you to find out more information about the programme. We will answer any questions and allow you to complete your application. There will also be the opportunity for you to meet other young people who will be going on the programme this summer.
Translators will be available on the day and light refreshments will be provided. Please confirm your attendance by emailing laura.rowland@the-challenge.org or by calling me on 07908945109.
If you have any questions, need someone to speak to your parent/guardian or want to finish off your application form, come along!
Your log in details are as follows:
ChallengeID: {!Account.TCNAccountID__c} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
Submitting your application online will give you a £5 online discount!
While we offer a wide range of start dates, there are a limited number of places available on each date. The quickest and easiest way to confirm a place is through our website. Please visit NCSTheChallenge.org for more information about the programme and to sign up today!
If you have any further questions, please visit our online FAQs. Alternatively you can email us at contact@the-challenge.org.
Yours sincerely,
Rebecca Carter Director at The Challenge
